text:
Lane | Several Engineering Roles | Toronto, Canada | Full-Time

Lane is a workplace experience platform. Our goal is to connect everything in your workday, making a disconnected fragmented ecosystem as friction-less as possible, and give you a great experience in your workday.

We have a modern stack of postgres, Redis, NodeJS, GraphQL, React, React Native.

Recently raised a $1M US seed round. Looking for awesome engineers to join. Come join a quick growing startup and get some equity.

https://www.joinlane.com/careers/
